    • Method Detail

      • doInitializations

        public void doInitializations(Harbor harbor,
                              ClientConnection client)
        Description copied from interface: Controller
        Method for initializing everything, that needs to be done right after a FXML file and its controller have been loaded. It provides the possibility to pass an Object to the controller, e.g. the model object the view represents.
        Specified by:
        doInitializations in interface Controller<Harbor>
        Parameters:
        harbor - the object to pass to the controller.
        client - the ClientConnection used to send messages to the Server.
